docs.snippet: At 6 feet 4 inches and 265 pounds, Brandon Jacobs has always been an imposing figure in the backfield, but beginning his second tour as a Giants player, he arrived chastened....
docs.lead_paragraph: At 6 feet 4 inches and 265 pounds, Brandon Jacobs has always been an imposing figure in the backfield, but beginning his second tour as a Giants player, he arrived chastened.
docs.abstract: New York Giants running back Brandon Jacobs, who is beginning his second tour with the Giants, has returned to the team chastened after a short stint in 2012 with San Francisco 49ers, in which he only had five carries before a Twitter message got him suspended and then released.

headline.main: Giants’ Jacobs Has a New Attitude to Go With His New Number

docs.snippet: Coach Giovanni Trapattoni was fired by Ireland after a five-year run. A 1-0 defeat at Austria on Tuesday, which left Ireland all but eliminated from the World Cup, sealed his fate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Giovanni Trapattoni was fired by Ireland after a five-year run. A 1-0 defeat at Austria on Tuesday, which left Ireland all but eliminated from the World Cup, sealed his fate.
docs.abstract: Ireland fires its men's national team soccer coach Giovanni Trapattoni after a 1-0 defeat at Austria all but eliminates Ireland from World Cup.
